titles.title: To require the Secretary of the Interior to consider, in issuing national park concessions contracts, the extent to which those contracts involve Indians and Indian-owned businesses, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Late Referral to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands (Jul 11, 94).

bill.summary: 5/11/1994--Introduced. Requires the Secretary of the Interior, in issuing national park concessions contracts, to consider the extent to which such contracts involve Indians and Indian-owned businesses.
